MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Minor feature additions and bug fixes.

English.Keywords: sound, audio, play, edit, record, effects, converter, wav, mp3, cool, noise, filter, album, extraction, forge, tape, vinyl, CD, LP, analysis, ripper, equalizer
English.Char_Desc_80: A comprehensive digital audio player, editor, converter, recorder, and analyzer
English.Char_Desc_250: A comprehensive digital audio player, editor, converter, recorder, and analyzer. It includes many effects, such as equalizers, noise reduction, and time warp. Displays real-time graphs. Supports MP3, WAV, OGG, and many more formats.
English.Char_Desc_450: GoldWave is a comprehensive digital audio editor. Use it to play, edit, mix, and analyze audio, or apply special effects, such as fade, equalizer, doppler, mechanize, echo, reverse, time warp, noise reduction, pop/click filter. New files can be recorded from cassettes, albums, radio, etc. or digitally copied from audio CDs. Real-time visualizations are displayed during playback and recording. Supports MP3, WAV, OGG, and many more formats.
English.Char_Desc_2000: GoldWave is a comprehensive digital audio editor. Use it to play, edit, mix, and analyze audio, or apply special effects, such as fade, equalizer, doppler, mechanize, echo, reverse, time warp, noise reduction, pop/click filter. New files can be recorded from cassettes, albums, radio, etc. or digitally copied from audio CDs. Real-time visualizations are displayed during playback and recording. Supports MP3, WAV, OGG, and many more formats and can perform batch conversions. Excellent value with free upgrades.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions:
This software may be distributed freely through web and ftp sites. Only the unmodified "zip" or "exe" file may be distributed or copied. You are prohibited from: - charging a fee or requesting donations for the software - renting the software - defeating shareware limits or using unauthorized passwords - distributing/including the software in commercial products - modifying or reverse engineering the software.
The software may be distributed on discs (such as CD-ROMs or DVDs) in cases where download sites issue discs of their collections. The software may be distributed on cover and companion discs associated with magazines and books.
Permissions.EULA:
The software may be installed on your system and used for a reasonable length of time to determine its usefulness, after which you agree to either purchase a license or uninstall the software.
The software is provided "as is", without warranty of any kind. GoldWave Inc. shall not be liable for damages of any kind. By using this software you agree to these terms.
